lucabara, thanx for the answer!  I was finally able to download footballmal's torrents - I'll explain how.  Maybe the problem is I'm using Azureus/Vuze, unlike most who use a version of uTorrent.
I was only able to do it by copying the magnet link, opening a new torrent, and pasting the magnet link. Then, I manually deleted all trackers except tracker.openbittorrent.com; only then did it work. Apparently, Azureus/Vuze is "poisoned" if the first/main tracker is invalid - which it normally is, being the piratebay one.
I would advise footballmal, if he wants his torrents to be more usable, to *not* use a non-working tracker as the first/main tracker of the torrent. Azureus gets poisoned in cases like that and can't work. At least that's how I diagnosed it. :)
